channel.title: How do i add mute command
channel.description: i keep getting spammers on my server i need a mute command please a simple one to

item.title: How do i add mute command
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:4, topic:280863”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=370928.msg2802789#msg2802789 date=1243543590]

[code] }
if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = true;
		writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
		sM("You have muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }[/code]

that just writes the name on the pad lol.
[/quote]

No… it mutes the player as well, read the entire command.

[code]client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = true;[/code][/quote]

:o Sorry for That M8

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add mute command

item.title: How do i add mute command

item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:3, topic:280863”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=370928.msg2802786#msg2802786 date=1243543442]

[code] }
if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = true;
		writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
		sM("You have muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }[/code]

[/quote]

that just writes the name on the pad lol.[/quote]

No… it mutes the player as well, read the entire command.

[code]client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = true;[/code]
